definition.procedurexml:
<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="MCItem" id="firework_item">firework_item</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="4"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="ADD3"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="variables_set_itemstack"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:firework_item</field><value name="VAL"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Items.FIREWORKS</field></block></value><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">CompoundTag explosion = new CompoundTag();&#10;explosion.putByte("Type", (byte) 0);&#10;explosion.put("Colors", new IntArrayTag(new int[]{&#10;            16645946,&#10;            13426154&#10;}));&#10;explosion.putBoolean("Flicker", false);&#10;explosion.putBoolean("Trail", false);</field><comment pinned="false" h="93" w="403">set explosion data in a CompoundTag:
Small ball explosion
Yellow/white colors
No flicker or trail</comment><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">ListTag explosions = new ListTag();&#10;explosions.add(explosion);&#10;&#10;CompoundTag fireworksTag = new CompoundTag();&#10;fireworksTag.putByte("Flight", (byte) 1);&#10;fireworksTag.put("Explosions", explosions);&#10;&#10;firework_item.getOrCreateTag().put("Fireworks", fireworksTag);</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Set firework item data</comment><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">if (world instanceof ServerLevel serverLevel) {&#10;FireworkRocketEntity firework = new FireworkRocketEntity(&#10;            serverLevel, x, y, z, firework_item&#10;);</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Create new firework entity</comment><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">CompoundTag tag = new CompoundTag();&#10;firework.saveWithoutId(tag);&#10;tag.putInt("LifeTime", 0);&#10;tag.putInt("Life", 0);&#10;firework.load(tag);</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">set firework life time to 0, so it explodes instantly</comment><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">firework.setOwner(sourceentity);&#10;serverLevel.addFreshEntity(firework);&#10;}</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">set owner to the player which shot the bow</comment></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
